name: Capital Trust Ventures
overview:
Capital Trust Ventures provides growth-stage venture capital financing for information technology companies. Our approach is to invest in high-growth businesses, help them achieve scale, and exit successfully. Our experienced team of partners has extensive investing and entrepreneurial experience in multiple sectors including application software, emerging technologies, vertical software, new media, internet content, e-commerce, and infrastructure software.

Areas of Investment

Vertical Specialties: Financial IT, Government IT, Education IT, Healthcare IT

Application Software: ERP/CRM/SRM, Business Intelligence, Human Capital Management, Enterprise Content Management

New Media: Applications and Platforms, Digital Media/Content, Internet Marketing, Vertical Marketplaces, E-Commerce

Infrastructure Software: Application Development Tools, Storage Management, Security, Network and Systems Management, Virtualization

Emerging Technologies: SaaS, Open Source, Mobile
